desc: Hello,This project is about developing Social Networking with Live Streaming app for:1- iOS iPhone2- Android smart phones3- Admin PanelThe project contains many SDK and the UX/UI is the most important part of it. As per the quotations received from many development companies in Bangalore, India, The project required 1200 - 1400 hrs.For this project, you have 2 options:1- Bid your best price for turnkey project ( without SDK cost ) - this you can submit it directly via the freelancer system.2- To work as a project manager, so you have to hire the required team who can do the quality work, you and the team will have high chance to be the development team of the company. For this option, please contact me.The project estimated hrs ( as per the development companies quotations )1- UI-UX design     70 - 80 hrs2- iOS Development    320 - 400 hrs3- Android Development    320 - 400 hrs4- Database and Web Admin panel  160 - 300 hrs5- API and Web Services   360 - 400 hrs6- Quality analysis and Release 40 - 60 hrsProject details and requirements will be shared with the nominated candidate.

desc: We need an application game developed for android and ios and eventually for pc and mac.here some characteristics:multiplayer onlineis a quiz game competition very similar to " quiz panic" ( made from [url removed, login to view] we need to change avatars and some rules.the game will be composed of 4 turns (Eighth finals, quarter finals, semifinals and the final)1 turn starts when 20 players will be in the same room and like you can see in the quiz panic, based on the correct answers and The time it took for to give the correct answers, Will generate a ranking, so who will be the first classifiedwill go forward to the 2 turn.the 2 turn will be also composed from 20 players that won the first turn.and in the same way the players can go forward to the 3 turn and 4 turn.in conclusion, will partecipate to the 4 turn (final) 20 players that won in a row 1, 2 and 3 turn._______________the avatars have to be animals and  the players can develop their avatar that can grow up from caterpillar till dragon. This will depend on the number of matches that they have played and the number of exact answers that they have guessed.after downloaded the app , for to play, need to make a registration and phone number confirmation (whatsapp style) and security password.for each user created need to have connected a bitcoin wallet becausethe game is pay to play.

desc: Smartphones provide anytime-anywhere communica- tions and are being increasingly used for a variety of pur- poses, e.g, sending email, performing online transactions, connecting with friends and acquaintances over social net- works. As a result, a considerable amount of sensitive per- sonal information is often generated and stored on smart- phones. Thus, smartphone users may face ﬁnancial as well as sentimental consequences if such information fall in the wrong hands. To address this problem all smartphones provide some form of user authentication, that is the pro- cess of verifying the user’s identity. Existing authentication mechanisms, such as using 4-digit passcodes or graphical patterns, suffer from multiple limitations - they are neither highly secure nor easy to input. A
